resources:
Hillffair 2K18
Select a number which is displayed on the screen\n
Number will not be selected if it vanishes\n
All the tickets must be selected in order to win\n
Winners will be awarded 15 points each
There will be 10 questions in total\n
One question will appear at a time\n
Select only one option\n
There is a time limit for each question\n
10 marks will be awarded for correct answer
Each person will get 5 spins a day\n
Enter the number that you want to match\n
25 points will be awarded for the correct match
http://hillffair.tk/
You are required to fill all the details correctly specially the Roll No as your account will be linked through it.\n Roll number would be verified at prize distribution. Incorrect roll number will lead to disqualification. >
